item.description:
So, we've already had 3 very successful football meetups at Four Green Fields. Last time was a PARTY!

THIS MEETUP IS CO-POSTED TO SOCIAL FUN!

This Meetup for the Pats SUPERBOWL will be crowded enough at Four Green Fields, so there will be plenty of socializing opportunity. Other places will be mobbed.

Join us in the heart of Boston for the biggest game with the greatest football team on the biggest screen (20 ft!)! Game time is at 6:30 PM.

http://boston.fourgreenfields.com/

Four Green Fields is huge with a 300 plus crowd capacity. But this bar is new, so we should be able to meetup as well as watch this huge game. Lets get there early to get in some pre-game socializing, find seating together, & get our orders in.

UPDATE: There is an optional all you can eat buffet. There is no cover at the door, but if you want to buy into the buffet you will get your buffet wristband for $20, at the door.  Get there earlier to find you table space! & find seats together.

As for drinks, Irish Coffee seems to be a favorite. Also Black & Tan (draft beer), both at reasonable prices. Appetizer specials: TBA.

The nearby T stop is State, on the Blue & Orange lines. Parking is available at the Pi Alley Garage on Washington St.

From the State T station go half a block to the corner of Washington St. on Court St. --That's just past the Old Court House. The facade @ # 1 Boston Place is a bank. Go around back on the left hand side to get to the pub entrance.

Service was great last time. Please remember to maintain your own tab & TAH TIP YAH SERVER!

GO PATS!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a flashing red light on my Irish tweed cap.
item.name: N. England Pats: Biggest Game w/ the Greatest Team on the Biggest Screen
